trends: There has been one other sighting in Shelburne
There were no other sightings in Shelburne on or around August 12th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Pulsing bright object/pulsing blue and red, moving away and toward us.
divs: sighting detailsfor the last month my neighbours and i have been going out in the township of melancthon ontario near our home town of shelburne. the first pictures captured of the object was in daylight and there are many many wind turbines in the area. it's almost as if they are attracted to them. my neighbour took the pictures, the following night i went out with them and i also got some similar pictures but in the dark. i also video taped. some of the pictures my neighbour captured are without explanation as they are very bizarre almost like beams of light! my one friend had an encounter with a being when she was 10 yrs old at belwood lake campgrounds not far from here. last weekend we went there camping and we caught a very bizarre picture of her. after taking many pictures none of them showed anything but us in the pic. tonight, we went back out near the windmills and took photos and a taping of an object that looked circular and very bright. when about to take a picture of it we can see it pulsing and jumping around, up, down and side to side. what is this? and why here? i have also seen a really bright green orb across my street above my neighbours roof of the house, it was there and gone very fast. 2 nights ago we went out again and we were watching a plane in the night sky when we saw a bright green\blue orb like object fly by the plane extremely fast, making the plane look like it was standing still...then it was gone! please help us understand what all this means and why here?? thanks for you time and consideration! *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms0. i have many many more pictures i would like to share, please let me know how i can do this! :)
